messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4342
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/4/2004 9:08:37 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Two of mine have always wanted to work in
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/4/2004 9:08:37 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Two of mine have always wanted to work in bookstores or libraries.
Rosie has stuck with the "I plan to be a librarian and a soccer
player," for quite a few years. Roya still wants to work in a
bookstore, but now she's getting picky - it has to be a feminist
bookstore.
********************
I used to own a Feminist Bookstore.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
